name: Diancie
description: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

abilities.name: Sparkle Veil
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your Pokémon take 30 less damage from attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Sensitive Ray
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.
